content.question: Winston Churchill’s “Iron Curtain” speech helped mark the beginning of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The Cold War between the United States and the Soviet Union
United States efforts to counteract Soviet influence by sending troops into Eastern Europe
United States campaigns to support democratic movements in Latin America
Soviet Union efforts to extend its influence into the countries of Western Europe

content.answer: The Cold War between the United States and the Soviet Union

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
